Title: Requires insurance contracts to cover neuropsychological examinations for dyslexia
Summary: Requires insurance contracts to cover neuropsychological examinations for dyslexia when performed by a health care professional licensed, certified, or authorized pursuant to title eight of the education law and acting within their scope of practice.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L (as proposed in S.5481-A & A.2898-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring certain insurance policies to cover neuropsychological exams for dyslexia
